relatedanime.anime: The Snack World: Hitogirai no Renny

anime.description:
Welcome to SNACK WORLD! This is a nutty universe filled with dreams and adventures. Here, you can find everything from dragons to smart devices. You can even find Chup, the hyperactive hero of this story.
Chup’s village was destroyed by a total jerk called Sultan Vinegar, who plagues the land with evil jerkiness. Chup sets out on a journey to take revenge on him and pay him back a thousand times over for what he did. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ランプの魔人ジニーズ登場!
Purple Cream Puffs!?
Lamp no Majin Genies Toujou!
episode.summary: To crush Madusa once and for all, Chup and company need reinforcements. Three large, flamboyant, purple genies lend helping hands (and feet) in their own musical way to the mission. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ピノキオ バージョン3.0
P-gnocchi-0 Version 3.0
Pinocchio Version 3.0
episode.summary: Will Chup discover a gadget to defeat Madusa at Gelatto’s shop? Before he and his companions find out, they hardcore haggle with android assistant (and self-professed Meloniac) P-gnocchi-0 Version 3.0. This deal might be tougher than charming snakes off Madusa’s head! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過激なシンデレラ
Steaming Ciderella
Kageki na Cinderella
episode.summary: At King Papaya’s request, Chup and pals receive elite tactical training from the super-strict Commander Ciderfella. If they survive the Commander’s boot camp, then Chup and said pals might have a shot at a real Madusa takedown. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレならできる! メドゥーサ討伐
Snack World! Adventure Bites!
Ore nara Dekiru! Medusa Toubatsu
episode.summary: Hyperactive hero Chup and his adventurous friends - Mayonna, Gobson, and Béarnaise - try to turn the tables on evil merchant Sultan Vinegar, who destroyed Chup’s village. En route to justice, the pals embark on a questionable side quest to defeat mythical Madusa and retrieve the Purple Eye for Chup’s crush, Princess Melonia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スーパー探検家ピーターパンパン
Greasy Pancake
Super Tankenka Peter Pan Pan
episode.summary: Princess Melonia now wants the love potion from the Bandshees, who were a pop sensation back in the day. To find the elixir and its gatekeepers, Chup and company enlist Peter Pancake, a self-proclaimed, roly-poly survivalist. ”Ranger Pancake” leads the pack on what might be a wild goose chase. Through it all, Chup remains a believer in the power of a greasy waffler. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そのとき, オレたちはすべてを知った
Nothing Like Fresh Cream
Sono Toki, Oretachi wa Subete o Shitta
episode.summary: With the help of pop diva Mermaidol, a transforming copybat, and one desert merman, Chup’s tiny search party makes slow progress toward its target: Kranel No. 2 Xtreme Moisturizing Cream. Will they achieve Chup’s goal to satisfy Princess Melonia’s delicate skin? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なんでも斬ることができる剣!?
Chop Shop
Nandemo Kiru Koto ga Dekiru Ken!?
episode.summary: While attempting to beat the Krapen, Chup, Mayonna, Gobson, Béarnaise, and Pigsy try out a special axe jara. Could it be the perfect tool to chop off a stubborn Krapen limb? Will they be able to extract the precious resource – Kranel No. 2 Xtreme Moisturizing Cream – for the even-more-precious Princess Melonia? Chup and his friends will risk life and ten limbs for the cause! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 砂漠のクラーケン
A Crispy Squid
Sabaku no Kraken
episode.summary: Princess Melonia has a new need: a rare, potent, beautifying skin cream from the large, intimidating, infamous monster called the Krapen. Chup is on it! He wrangles his posse, and the gang reluctantly accepts this probable fool’s errand. With help from a multilingual mermaid pop star, the group attempts to snag Kranel No. 2 Xtreme Moisturizing Cream for Chup’s No. 1 lady love. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴブリンになった王子
A Pickled Prince
Goblin ni Natta Ouji
episode.summary: On a quest for Immortali Tea to save sickly Melonia, Chup and friends encounter the fierce, fiery Fearnix. This giant bird has the power to cause its victims to witness unsavory parts of their past. The Fearnix targets Gobson first. Then, Gobson’s royal backstory is exposed in all its juicy details. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: セイレーン命懸けの愛
A Cheesy Reunion
Seireen Inochigake no Ai
episode.summary: Bandshees issue an ultimatum to Chup: They’ll swap the love potion for the missing side of their mysterious love triangle. With the assistance of pro matchmakers Romano and Julienne, Chup and his friends can’t lose, right?! However, the course of true love doth never run smooth; plus, the Bandshees’ love triangle has its own funky groove... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新世代アイドル 赤ずきん48
Tales From the Spice Rack
Shinsekai Idol: Akazukin 48
episode.summary: When their singing falls flat with the Bandshees, Chup and company appeal to celeb songstresses the Spicy Galz. Team Chup chooses one of the 48 Galz to advocate on their behalf. Chup hopes that Ginja Spicy’s rags-to-riches story will inspire a loosening of the Bandshees’ grip on that love potion. But could Chup’s hope be just a pipe dream? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白雪ディープゾーン
Sloe White`s All-You-Can-Sleep
Shirayuki Deep Zone
episode.summary: The Bandshees prove to be worthy guardians of their love potion. Chup and crew consult Sloe White, the sleepy forest psychic and foodie, on this matter. Sloe White advises that, in dealing with divas, one should charm them with music. Chup and pals sing their hearts out, and Commander Ciderfella - plus the Genie ACEs - provide backup. Is this group good enough to get the Bandshees’ special brew? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャップ ザ ビギニング
Chup`s Amuse-bouche
Chappu Beginning
episode.summary: Melonia hosts a royal birthday party, but the festivities quickly sour due to an imposter Chup. The real Chup and his companions attempt to set things right with help from King Papaya and the Dragon Heart, a mystical – yet practical - treasure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マッチ売りのマヨネ
Flavorful Mayonna
Match Uri no Mayone
episode.summary: With a generous helping of Mayonna, Chup and his entourage face the Fearnix once more. Through another vision, they observe the origin of Chup and Mayonna’s friendship. The vision serves an interesting morsel about Mayonna’s family’s finances. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 落ちこぼれのペペロン
Meat-ing New Friends
Ochikobore no Peperon
episode.summary: Team Chup has another chance to even its score against the Fearnix. During the encounter, they witness a vision featuring Chup and Béarnaise. Ultimately, a tall tale about Chup and Béarnaise’s friendship is trashed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブタ子, 買います
A Pig to Remember
Buta Ko, Kaimasu
episode.summary: En route to their Fearnix showdown, Chup and crew encounter a pair of annoying monsters called Will ‘n’ Wisp. The disturbing duo launches an esteem-crushing roast of our heroes. Afterward, the Fearnix marks Pigsy as its next prey. Pigsy recalls her traumatic time at Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery, but she soon proves that you can’t keep a good pig down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なんてったってヴァンパイアハンター
Silent but Bloody Stakes
Nantettatte Vampire Hunter
episode.summary: To confront Sultan Vinegar at the Distillery, Chup and comrades first must cross paths with VamPIEr, the terror of the moonlit back alley. They suit up, so to speak, with their secret weapon. However, the potent backfire has unintended consequences on the enemy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャップ, 新天地へ
Bonbon Voyage
Chappu, Shin Tenchi e
episode.summary: Chup and friends leave Tutti-Frutti via the Transcontinental Railroad. Their destination is the dark skies of Metrufflis. Their goal is to serve just “desserts” for Sultan Vinegar. The friends’ train ride unexpectedly reveals a surprise connection between Chup and mysterious swordsman Velouté. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒り爆発! ビネガーとの再会
Chupped Salad with Vinegar
Ikari Bakuhatsu! Vinegar to no Saikai
episode.summary: After swallowing the Dragon Heart, Pigsy runs wild. She is nearly unrecognizable as grotesque, dangerous, and destructive Bigwigsy Pigsy. Chup is desperate to rehabilitate her, but an abrupt appearance of Sultan Vinegar cooks those plans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れ, シブチン!
Run, Paw Paw!
Hashire, Shipuchin!
episode.summary: When the Dragon Heart disappears, Chup, his cohorts, and King Papaya believe that royal pup Paw Paw is guilty. Melonia’s fate could rest in the hands of their fluffy little friend. Wrangling this particular canine might be Chup’s biggest challenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スナックワールド プレゼンツ「チャップのよくわかる大冒険日記!」
Episode S1
Snack World Presents "Chappu no Yoku Wakaru Bouken Nikki!"
ジニーズ殺人事件 犯人はゴブさん!?
Episode 24
Genies Satsujin Jiken: Hannin wa Gob-san!?
チリペッパー警部の謎解き依頼
A Mussel Mystery Dinner
Chili Pepper Keibu no Nazotoki Irai
episode.summary: Captain Mussel offers to escort Chup and his friends to Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery. Naturally, there is a catch. The Captain requires help in locating “The Eternal Rose,” a pricey painting gone missing from Sir Loin-Stake’s mansion. Will this odd fishing expedition catch an art thief? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギンギンの銀の弾丸イグニッション
All Bark; No Bite!
Gingin no Gin no Dangan Ignition
episode.summary: Mr. Wolfmann, Chup, Velouté, and friends visit Fidostein, watchdog of VamPIEr’s weakness: the silver stakes. Mr. Wolfmann and Fidostein are lifelong buddies; however VamPIEr, their former friend, is now their common enemy. The stakes are high as VamPIEr blocks passage to Vinegar’s Distillery. Will the combined strength of heroes and canines beat VamPIEr? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月夜のオッサンラプソディ
Who Wants the Last Slice of Pie?
Tsukiyo no Ossan Rhapsody
episode.summary: Velouté, Chup, and company encounter an accountant. However, this is no ho-hum bookkeeper: Mr. Wolfmann is a werewolf in sheepish clothing. Chup and the gang pin their hopes on Mr. Wolfmann and his potential to vanquish VamPIEr. But if Mr. Wolfmann messes up, then Chup’s quest might be ruined. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 来たぞ! ドラゴン少林寺!!
Episode 28
Kitazo! Dragon Shourinji!!
ブタ子大作戦! スカードン接近遭遇!!
Dragonfruit and Dungeons
Butako Daisakusen! Skardon Sekkin Souguu!!
episode.summary: Velouté conceives a scheme to infiltrate Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery and retrieve the Dragon Heart. Little Pigsy is a big part of this scheme. Chup and friends witness Pigsy’s covert mission via webcam. Pigsy gives it her best shot; meanwhile, the ghost of Sultan Vinegar’s dragon Smörg Åsbord causes chaos. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらばチリペッパー 最後の事件
Who Doughnut?
Saraba Chili Pepper: Saigo no Jiken
episode.summary: There is a party at Sir Loin-Stake’s mansion, and Team Chup are the guests of honor. Captain Mussel intends to honor the team’s recent crime-solving savvy; however, a mysterious letter dampens the mood. Apparently, dark magic will overrun the mansion at the strike of twelve. Suddenly, the festivities spiral into a frantic, finger-pointing, seemingly fruitless search for the suspect. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マヨネのいない日
Hold the Mayo
Mayone no Inai Hi
episode.summary: Mayonna goes missing, but luckily, Chup, Gobson, Béarnaise, and Captain Mussel keep cool heads during the crisis. They quickly investigate Mayonna’s disappearance. After an unproductive search, they hold auditions for a Mayonna replacement. The adorable Wicked Witch joins other monsters onstage to compete for this recognition. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説のデアファルコンを見た!
Episode 30
Densetsu no Deafalcon o Mita!
強敵!? ニンジャマン・アシュラ見参
Episode 29
Kyouteki!? Ninjaman Ashura Kenzan
世紀の対決!? ジェニファー山本!
Episode 32
Seiki no Taiketsu!? Jennifer Yamamoto!
ドラゴンナイトの試練 出てこい強いやつ!
Episode 31
Dragon Knight no Shiren: Dete Koi Tsuyoi Yatsu!
大決戦ビネガーパレス! なるか1000倍返し!!
Episode 36
Dai Kessen Vinegar Palace! Naruka 1000 Bai Kaeshi!!
決戦前夜, メローラ姫にさよならを
Episode 35
Kessen Zen`ya, Merola-hime ni Sayonara o
聖竜への挑戦! 大波乱のファイナルマッチ!
Episode 34
Seiryuu e no Chousen! Dai Haran no Final Match!
白雪デンジャラスゾーン
Episode 33
Shirayuki Dangerous Zone
勝負の行方! チャップ吼える!
Episode 37
Shoubu no Yukue! Chappu Hoeru!
つくるぞ! グレート飛空艇!!
Episode 40
Tsukuruzo! Great Hikuutei!!
伝説の鍛冶師, ゴエモンを探せ
Episode 39
Densetsu no Kajishi, Goemon o Sagase
グレートに飛べ! スカイバラクーダ!!
Episode 44
Great ni Tobe! Sky Barracuda!!
フェアリーエレクトロニクスの新製品
Episode 43
Fairy Electronics no Shinseihin
パカラ・ラパのうまうま大作戦!!
Episode 42
Pakara Rapa no Umauma Daisakusen!!
美しき淑女のペファニー
Episode 41
Utsukushiki Shukujo no Peffany
誕生! 魔王みたいなやつ
Episode 48
Tanjou! Maou Mitai na Yatsu
がんばれ! 勇者ロビンフッド
Episode 46
Ganbare! Yuusha Robin Hood
大冒険はエンドレスだ!
Episode 50
Daibouken wa Endless Da!
魔王デミグラスの秘密を暴け
Episode 49
Maou Demi Glass no Himitsu o Abake
